text: Andrea Sartoretti (born June 19, 1971) is an Italian former volleyball player. He has won two silver medals and a bronze medal in three Olympic Games between 1996 and 2004. ==Clubs== Team Country From To Città di Castello 1988–1989 1990–1991 Ravenna 1991–1992 1995–1996 Modena 1996–1997 1996–1997 Montichiari 1997–1998 1999–2000 Cuneo 2000–2001 2001–2002 Trento 2002–2003 2004–2005 Modena 2005–2006 2008–2009 ==References== * Sports-ref Profile Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Medalists at the 2004 Summer Olympics Category:Medalists at the 2000 Summer Olympics Category:Medalists at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Italian volleyball players Category:Sportspeople from Umbria Category:People from Perugia
title: Andrea Sartoretti
